(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Red) (NNP Bean) (NNP Soup))
    (ADVP (RB always))
    (VP (VBZ reminds)
      (NP
        (NP (PRP me))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP (PRP$ my) (NN kindergarten) (NNS days))))
      (PP (IN at)
        (NP (DT the) (NNP PAP))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP It))
    (VP (VBZ 's)
      (ADJP (JJ nostalgic)
        (PP (IN in)
          (NP
            (NP (DT a) (NN sort))
            (PP (IN of)
              (NP (DT a) (JJ bad) (NN way))))))
      (`` `)
      (NP
        (NP (NN cos))
        (SBAR
          (S
            (NP (PRP I))
            (ADVP (RB always))
            (VP (VBP remember)
              (SBAR
                (S
                  (NP (PRP it))
                  (VP (VBZ is)
                    (NP
                      (NP (DT the) (JJS worst) (JJ red) (NN bean) (NN soup))
                      (PP (IN in)
                        (NP (DT the) (NN world))))))))))))
    (. .)))

rcmod(cos-12, remember-15)

              (NP (DT the) (JJ red) (NNS beans))
              (PP (IN in)

  (S

              (NP (DT the) (JJS simplest) (NNS desserts))

                (NP (DT the) (NN world)

                          (WHNP (WDT which))

                                (WHADVP (WRB why))

            (NP (PRP you))
            (VP (VBP need)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP She))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP
        (ADJP (RB so) (JJ old))
        (NN school))
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP (PRP she))
          (VP (VBZ is)
            (ADVP (RB still))
            (NP
              (NP (CD one))
              (PP (IN of)
                (NP (DT the) (JJ few) (NNS ladies) (IN around)))
              (SBAR
                (WHNP (WP who))
                (S
                  (ADVP (RB still))
                  (VP (VBP like)
                    (S
                      (VP (TO to)
                        (VP (VB wear)
                          (NP (JJ sleeveless) (NN grandma) (NNS clothes)))))))))))))
    (. .)))

cop(school-5, is-2)
advmod(old-4, so-3)
amod(school-5, old-4)
root(ROOT-0, school-5)

cop(one-10, is-8)
advmod(one-10, still-9)
ccomp(school-5, one-10)
prep(one-10, of-11)
det(ladies-14, the-12)
amod(ladies-14, few-13)
pobj(of-11, ladies-14)
amod(ladies-14, around-15)

advmod(like-18, still-17)
rcmod(one-10, like-18)
aux(wear-20, to-19)
xcomp(like-18, wear-20)

dobj(wear-20, clothes-23)

    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (NP (NNP Conclusion))
    (PP (IN In)
      (NP
        (NP (DT a) (NN place))
        (PP (IN like)
          (NP (NNP Singapore)))
        (SBAR
          (WHADVP (WRB where))
          (S
            (NP (NN everything))
            (VP (VBZ seems)
              (S
                (VP (TO to)
                  (VP (VB change)
                    (ADVP (RB too) (RB fast))))))))
        (, ,)))))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP it))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (ADJP (JJ good)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB know)
              (SBAR (IN that)
                (S
                  (NP (EX there))
                  (VP (VBP are)
                    (NP
                      (NP (NNS hawkers))
                      (SBAR
                        (WHNP (WP who))
                        (S
                          (VP (VBP do) (RB n't)
                            (VP (VB want)
                              (S
                                (VP (TO to)
                                  (VP (VB change)
                                    (NP (NN anything))))))))))))))))))
    (, ,)))

cop(good-3, is-2)
root(ROOT-0, good-3)
aux(know-5, to-4)
xcomp(good-3, know-5)
mark(are-8, that-6)
expl(are-8, there-7)
ccomp(know-5, are-8)
nsubj(are-8, hawkers-9)

aux(want-13, do-11)
neg(want-13, n't-12)

dobj(change-15, anything-16)

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Xi) (NNP Le) (NNP Ting) (NNP Dessert) (NNP Stall))
    (VP (VBP no.)
      (NP (CD 70) (NNP Commonwealth) (NNP Crescent) (NNP Food) (NNP Centre) (NNPS 12pm))
      (PP (TO to)
        (NP
          (NP (NNP 10pm) (NNP Closed) (NNP Fortnightly))
          (PP (IN on)
            (NP (NNP Mon-Tues))))))))


nn(Stall-5, Xi-1)
nn(Stall-5, Le-2)
nn(Stall-5, Ting-3)
nn(Stall-5, Dessert-4)
nsubj(no.-6, Stall-5)
root(ROOT-0, no.-6)
num(12pm-12, 70-7)
nn(12pm-12, Commonwealth-8)
nn(12pm-12, Crescent-9)
nn(12pm-12, Food-10)
nn(12pm-12, Centre-11)
dobj(no.-6, 12pm-12)
prep(no.-6, to-13)
nn(Fortnightly-16, 10pm-14)
nn(Fortnightly-16, Closed-15)
pobj(to-13, Fortnightly-16)
prep(Fortnightly-16, on-17)
pobj(on-17, Mon-Tues-18)
